New Records: Tilak Varma became the youngest Indian to score a fifty in T20 Internationals.
Key Match Events: Tilak Varma and Ishan Kishan put up a crucial 42-run partnership.
Tilak Varma and Hardik Pandya stitched a 38-run stand.
Hardik Pandya hit two sixes before being dismissed by Alzarri Joseph.
Ishan Kishan scored 27 off 23 balls before being bowled by Romario Shepherd.
Shubman Gill hit a six but was dismissed in the next ball by Alzarri Joseph.
Suryakumar Yadav was run-out by Kyle Mayers.
Sanju Samson was stumped by Nicholas Pooran.
